name: WWE (Weed Whacker EXTREME)
description:
WHACK. THOSE. WEEDS. Let the flowers grow, but keep the weeds from getting to the top! Whatever you do, don't let your points get to zero!

The red flowers give you points when they get to the top of the screen. Accidentally click them, and you lose points. The yellow weeds subtract points. Try and click them before they reach the top of the page. You lose when your score reaches zero.
